### 2.The link to the data source: http://www.planecrashinfo.com/database.htm
### 3.Overview of dataset: 
This database recorded all kinds of plane crash accidents worldwide from 1920 up to now. It's a database on the website which need to be scraped. In each record, specific information such as date, time, airline operator, flight number, aircraft type, total fatalities aboard, and total killed on the ground are included.

### 4.What questions can be answered from the dataset?
Analyzing aircraft accident data is useful for people, after all, no one wants a disaster to happen. Questions blew can be answered from the data.(More questions may add in final)
